replies.body: Not sure how we happened to miss those others posts, I personally apologize for that! We do prefer to have this type of request done in a ticket so that we have proof of your request should any issues arise in the future. Please submit that [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you haven't yet, and feel free to notify me in a reply and I'll grab it for you!
